data.name: send_slack_message
data.description:
Send a message to a Slack channel using Slack API.

This tool sends a message to a specified Slack channel using the Slack API. It should be called when you want to post a message automatically to a channel or direct message within Slack.

parameters.name: target_channel
parameters.description: The encoded ID or name of the Slack channel, private group, or IM to send the message to.

parameters.name: message_attachments
parameters.description: A JSON array of structured attachments, URL-encoded. Use this to include rich content like charts or interactive elements in the Slack message.

parameters.name: message_blocks
parameters.description: A JSON-based array of structured blocks for formatting the message. It should be URL-encoded and follow Slack's Block Kit structure.

parameters.name: message_icon_emoji
parameters.description: Emoji to use as the icon for the message. Overrides icon_url. Use a format like ':emoji_name:'.

parameters.name: message_icon_image_url
parameters.description: The URL of the image to be used as the icon for the Slack message.

parameters.name: message_markdown_text
parameters.description: Message content formatted in markdown, up to 12,000 characters. Avoid using with `blocks` or `text`.

parameters.name: event_metadata
parameters.description: JSON object with 'event_type' and 'event_payload' fields, URL-encoded. Used for metadata accessible by apps or users in the workspace.

parameters.name: message_treatment
parameters.description: Specify how the Slack message should be treated for parsing, such as `none` or `full` for different parsing behaviors.

parameters.name: message_text
parameters.description: The main content of the Slack message. Recommended to provide a fallback when using `blocks`.

parameters.name: reply_thread_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp of the parent message to make this message a reply. Avoid using a reply's timestamp; use its parent instead.

parameters.name: bot_username
parameters.description: Specify the bot's username to be displayed when the message is sent to the Slack channel.

parameters.name: find_and_link_user_groups
parameters.description: Set to true to find and link user groups in the message. Individual user linking is not supported.

parameters.name: enable_slack_markup_parsing
parameters.description: Set to false to disable Slack markup parsing for the message. Parsing is enabled by default (default: true).

parameters.name: make_reply_visible_to_channel
parameters.description: Set to true to make the reply visible to everyone in the channel or conversation when used with `thread_ts`. (default: false)

parameters.name: enable_unfurling_of_links
parameters.description: Set to true to enable automatic expansion of primarily text-based links in the message.

parameters.name: enable_media_unfurling
parameters.description: Set to false to prevent the automatic display of media content in Slack messages.
